text: 27:15 Ua Me Ini 20:4; 34:17; Ofa Gami 19:4; 26:1; Godɨn Araziba 4:15-18; 5:8‘Gumazitam asetamɨn marvir guam dagɨamɨn an ingari, o temetamɨn anekɨrigham, o ainɨn an ingarigh modogh an ziam fɨtɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God gumazir kam gasɨghasigham. Bizir kaba, kar gumaziba uari ingarizir biziba, ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, gumazamiziba marvir guabar ziaba fan a bar aghua.’ Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar kamaghɨn akam ikaragh suam, ‘Bar guizbangɨra, God kamaghɨra damu.’
